text: Valneva Announces Positive Final Phase 2 Results for Lyme Disease Vaccine Candidate. Saint-Herblain (France), November 26, 2025 – Valneva SE (Nasdaq: VALN; Euronext Paris: VLA) today announced positive final immunogenicity and safety data from Phase 2 study, VLA15-221, of Lyme disease vaccine candidate, VLA15. The results showed strong anamnestic immune response and favorable safety profile six months after a third booster dose (month 48) in all age groups, confirming compatibility with the anticipated benefits of a yearly vaccination prior to each Lyme season. Pfizer and Valneva entered into a collaboration agreement in April 2020 for the development and commercialization of VLA15 by Pfizer.
label: positive
